level.heading: PRODUCT REGISTRATION FEES AND TERMS (ยง 20-2506)

level.text: The registration for each pesticide product shall be for a period of one (1) year beginning on January 1st and expiring on December 31st.

The registration fee for each pesticide product shall be fifty dollars ($ 50), beginning January 1, 2002, seventy-five dollars ($ 75), beginning January 1, 2003, and one hundred dollars ($ 100), beginning January 1, 2004.
The license for a private applicator shall be issued for a period of three (3) years beginning on April 1st and expiring on March 31st.
The license fee for a private applicator shall be thirty dollars ($30).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 3044 (October 6, 1978), incorporating Proposed Rulemaking published at 25 DCR 2118 (August 25, 1978); and as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 8744 (September 21, 2001).
